Description in English 
---------------------------------------
 In this Swedish thriller, a man with "divine" abilities wreaks havoc upon the residents of a small island off the Swedish coast. Tomas is accepted into the tiny community after he demonstrates his talent for diving water or oil. Tomas is a con artist.
